chapter.title: Changes for &PRODUCT; Administrators
chapter.para: &PRODUCT; Administrators are people who are ultimately responsible for the operation and maintenance of an &PRODUCT; system. &PRODUCT; Administrators are responsible for adding new features and higher level tasks which sometimes require admin access to the Web UI and often command line access to the &PRODUCT; server they administrate.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following changes for &PRODUCT; Administrators have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

variablelist.title: Features, Enhancements, and Bug Fixes for Administrators

listitem.para: The default logging levels for &PRODUCT; have been turned down from DEBUG. (Bug #4047)
A change was made to turn down excessive logging for remote pollers. (Bug #4045)
A bug that caused IPLIKE installation to fail on 64-bit Debian Lenny has been fixed. (Bug #4039)
